title: How to Make Italian Dressing with Apple Cider Vinegar

steps.headline: Mix the vinegar with all of the other ingredients.
steps.description: Do this in the container you will be using it in. (A glass container works better.)

steps.headline: Shake the container to mix everything thoroughly.
steps.description: Be sure that the sugar and salt are completely dissolved.

steps.headline: Add the oil and shake well to mix.
Store unused dressing in the refrigerator.

text: Mix the vinegar with all of the other ingredients. Do this in the container you will be using it in. (A glass container works better.) Shake the container to mix everything thoroughly. Be sure that the sugar and salt are completely dissolved. Add the oil and shake well to mix.  Store unused dressing in the refrigerator.
